tool.name: EchoProcess
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraycomplexInput False output_data_literalOutput $output_data_literalOutput output_data_complexOutput $output_data_complexOutput output_data_c $output_data_c name EchoProcess literalInput '$literalInput' complexInput $complexInput #for $i_repeat in $c.bbox floatData $i_repeat.floatData #end for crs $c.crs prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_literalOutput $OutputSection_literalOutput.transmissionMode_literalOutput outputType_complexOutput $OutputSection_complexOutput.outputType_complexOutput transmissionMode_complexOutput $OutputSection_complexOutput.transmissionMode_complexOutput transmissionMode_c $OutputSection_c.transmissionMode_c

param.name: complexInput
param.label: Complex Input
param.help: A complex input The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json

param.name: floatData
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

param.name: crs
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_literalOutput
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_complexOutput
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_complexOutput
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_c
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: Simply echo the value provided as input
